A funk cover of Hall & Oates' "Rich Girl" by Scary Pockets & Arielle Kasnetz.

MUSICIAN CREDITS

Drums: Steve Goold
Bass: Nick Campbell
Guitar: Carmen Vandenberg & Ryan Lerman
